game.name: Ghost Restaurant
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a mysterious restaurant that serves as the final stop for lost souls, you are the Memory Chef. Explore the pasts of your customers, each a broken recipe waiting to be mended. Solve atmospheric puzzles, understand their deepest regrets, and serve their last meal to finally let them rest.
